import { PieChart, Pie, Cell, ResponsiveContainer, Legend, Tooltip } from "recharts" export default function BudgetBreakdown() { const data = [ { name: "Billboard Rental", value: 8000 }, { name: "Fuel", value: 1000 }, { name: "Ad Design", value: 1000 }, ] const COLORS = ["#0088FE", "#00C49F", "#FFBB28"] return (

Budget Breakdown

{data.map((entry, index) => ( ))} `₹${value}`} />
Total Budget: ₹10,000

• Billboard Rental: ₹4,000/day for 2 days = ₹8,000

• Fuel and additional costs: ₹1,000

• Professional ad design: ₹1,000

) }
